author: Alena Gupaisova
excerpt: Admission to the Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence bachelor's program at Neapolis University Pafos is open! Find out more about the program and the JetBrains Foundation full scholarships.
text: The place for learning and teaching computer science your way Offline ProgramsAdmission for the Computer Science and AI BSc Is Open Admission to the Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence bachelor’s program at Neapolis University Pafos is open!  The JetBrains Foundation supports this bachelor’s program and offers 15 fully funded scholarships for the most talented applicants. The scholarships cover tuition, accommodation, medical insurance, visa fees, and spending money (€300 per month). Many students who graduate from bachelor’s and master’s programs developed in collaboration with the JetBrains Foundation work at top IT companies like Meta, Google, and JetBrains, so don’t miss your chance to join the team! Find out more about the program here.  2025 key admission dates First admission round: Application deadline – April 23 Entrance test – April 27 Second admission round: Application deadline – June 11 Entrance test – June 15 Upcoming events Join our next livestream with the program team on March 11, 2025. In it, our experts will share details about the curriculum and admission process.  If you’re in Cyprus, attend our Open Day on March 15 to meet the program’s professors, speak with current students, and tour the campus.  March 15, 12:00 – 03:00 pm Where: Neapolis University Pafos, 2 Danais Avenue, Paphos 8042 Learn more about the Open Day here. Contact us Do you have any questions? Drop us a line via Telegram chat or nup@jetbrains.com. Don’t miss this opportunity to launch your career in one of today’s most dynamic and in-demand fields. Apply now and take the first step toward your future in Computer Science and AI! Subscribe to JetBrains Academy updates Discover more
html:
The place for learning and teaching computer science your way

Offline Programs

Admission for the Computer Science and AI BSc Is Open

Admission to the Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence bachelor’s program at Neapolis University Pafos is open! 

The JetBrains Foundation supports this bachelor’s program and offers 15 fully funded scholarships for the most talented applicants. The scholarships cover tuition, accommodation, medical insurance, visa fees, and spending money (€300 per month).

Many students who graduate from bachelor’s and master’s programs developed in collaboration with the JetBrains Foundation work at top IT companies like Meta, Google, and JetBrains, so don’t miss your chance to join the team!

Find out more about the program here. 

2025 key admission dates

First admission round:

Application deadline – April 23

Entrance test – April 27

Second admission round:

Application deadline – June 11

Entrance test – June 15

Upcoming events

Join our next livestream with the program team on March 11, 2025. In it, our experts will share details about the curriculum and admission process. 

If you’re in Cyprus, attend our Open Day on March 15 to meet the program’s professors, speak with current students, and tour the campus. 

March 15, 12:00 – 03:00 pm

Where: Neapolis University Pafos, 2 Danais Avenue, Paphos 8042

Learn more about the Open Day here.

Contact us

Do you have any questions? Drop us a line via Telegram chat or nup@jetbrains.com.

Don’t miss this opportunity to launch your career in one of today’s most dynamic and in-demand fields. Apply now and take the first step toward your future in Computer Science and AI!

Subscribe to JetBrains Academy updates

Discover more
